text: Sinead will give a seminar at the Groningen Institute for Evolutionary Life Sciences, University of GroningenÂ (hosted by Dr Hannah Dugdale and Dr Alexandra Sparks).
Sinead will give a seminar at the University of Veterinary Medicine Vienna (hosted by Dr Stefan Fischer).

Antoine will present at the Evolution conference (joint annual meeting of the American Society of Naturalists, the Society for the Study of Evolution, and the Society of Systematic Biologists) on 'An age-dependent framework of optimal maternal allocation regarding energy intake and metabolic costs, and the impact of nutritional stress in a viviparous disease vector'.
